update_plan.update_summary: Document the addition of new categories to the training summary and their impact on project versatility and adaptability.
key_changes: Addition of new categories in the training summary file
Introduction of new functionality in multiple components
Reorganization of categories within the training summary file

specific_updates.README.md: 1. Update project introduction to reflect the changes in the training summary file, 2. Explain the new categories and their significance, 3. Discuss how these changes expand the scope of tasks tracked during training.
specific_updates.master_blueprint.md: 1. Revise the design of the Training Summary component to accommodate the new categories, 2. Include a section discussing the potential benefits of diversifying the project tasks.
specific_updates.current_status.json: 1. Update the 'Training Summary' section with the new categories, 2. Provide information on how the training process has been affected by these changes.
